      • SearchCity

        public static java.util.ArrayList<City> SearchCity(java.lang.String cityName,
                                   java.lang.String cityDescription,
                                   java.lang.String placeName,
                                   java.lang.String placeDescription)
        Function that search the database for the desired cities with the properties of this function input (search only published versions).
        Parameters:
        cityName - the city name (or part of it)
        cityDescription - the city description (or words it contains)
        placeName - the place of interest that in the city name (or part of it)
        placeDescription - the place of interest that in the city description (or words it contains)
        Returns:
        search result- list of cities that was found

      • SearchCity

        public static java.util.ArrayList<City> SearchCity(java.lang.String cityName,
                                   java.lang.String cityDescription,
                                   java.lang.String placeName,
                                   java.lang.String placeDescription,
                                   boolean useUnpublished)
        Function that search the database for the desired cities with the properties of this function input.
        Parameters:
        cityName - the city name (or part of it)
        cityDescription - the city description (or words it contains)
        placeName - the place of interest that in the city name (or part of it)
        placeDescription - the place of interest that in the city description (or words it contains)
        useUnpublished - if to also search in the unpublished versions of the cities
        Returns:
        search result- list of cities that was found
